title: Can't choose a champion
body:
So, I was waiting my 20 minute queues after Internet Crashing etc. and then I get into a game.

I call mid, and I try to choose a champion but nothing pops up so I am stuck, now I have to wait a good 15 minutes for queue dodge timer and possible 20 minute queue. What to do, what to do.

replies.body: Is your screen completely blank or was the champion grid absent?
